Plot: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.
Title: Lockout
Writer: Stephen St. Leger (screenplay), James Mather (screenplay), Luc Besson (screenplay), Luc Besson (original idea)
Actors: Guy Pearce, Maggie Grace, Vincent Regan, Joseph Gilgun
tomatoConsensus: Guy Pearce does the best he can with what he's given, but Lockout is ultimately too derivative and shallow to build on the many sci-fi thrillers it borrows from.
